channel.title: +शुद्रकमलाकरः सानुवादः on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +शुद्रकमलाकरः सानुवादः on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: मूलम्
item.description: विस्तारः (द्रष्टुं नोद्यम्) **Searchable Electronic Edition of Śūdradharmatattvaprakāśa alias Śūdrakamalākara, **transcribed and color-coded by Patrick Olivelle, is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. Last updated: April 2024 Patrick Olivelle (jpo@austin.utexas.edu) University of Texas at Austin Kamalākaraśarman Śūdradharmatattvaprakāśa _alias _Śūdrakamalākara. Edited with Marathi translation: Nirnaya Sagar Press, Bombay, 1895; reprint 1910, 1928. Edited in Pothi form. No date or place of publication. Available at: https://www.google.com/books/edition/Śūdrakamalākara/8yvQuG3QIqsC?hl=en&gbpv=1&dq=Śūdrakamalākara&pg=PA25-IA1&printsec=frontcover Transcribed by Patrick Olivelle
